features: Musical toy airplane with lights, music and sounds for toddler and preschool pretend play
Place Pilot Kurt in the pilot’s seat or push the Discovery Button for fun sounds, songs and lights
Spin the turbine and take to the skies!
Includes 1 airplane and 2 figures sized just right for small hands to grasp and move, helping to strengthen fine motor skills
Item arrives in frustration-free, easy-to-open packaging that's 100% recyclable. For a gift-ready box, select 'Ship in Amazon packaging' at checkout.
body.description: Buckle up and prepare to take off on all kinds of exciting adventures with the Little People Travel Together Airplane! When toddlers place Pilot Kurt in his seat, they'll see the plane light up and hear fun songs and sounds about exploring the world with friends. With Emma on board, kids can press the Discovery Button for more sounds and songs. Then get the turbines spinning and take to the skies! Little travelers will have a blast sending Pilot Kurt and Emma soaring through the skies and sharing all new adventures together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Off we go together! With the Fisher-Price Little People Travel Together Airplane, your kiddo can embark on all kinds of exciting adventures with new friends, Pilot Kurt and Emma! Because experiencing new things is even more fun when you’re sharing them with friends. Product Features Place Pilot Kurt in the pilot’s seat for fun sounds, songs & lights Press the Discovery Button for more sounds and phrases Spin the turbine & take to the skies!

Wheels up, let’s fly! Welcome aboard, let's get this adventure started! As Pilot Kurt takes his seat in the cockpit, toddlers will hear cool sounds and songs and see the lights turn on. When kids press the Discovery Button, they'll hear even more songs and phrases about how fun it is to share new experiences. Then spin the turbine and Pilot Kurt and Emma can take to the skies together! Zoom!

Where development comes into play! Little things that make a big difference Playful songs and phrases help little travelers learn that sharing a new experience with others can be super fun! Children learn as the play As kids place pilot Kurt & Emma in their seats and imagine all sorts of high-flying adventures, they see how fun it can be to share a new experience with others. Promotes creativity As toddlers discover how to activate the airplane's lights, sounds and songs, they'll see how their actions can make fun things happen—a great intro to cause & effect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great toys for toddlers. Exactly as described and at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always a hit!
reviews.reviewText: Little people are the best gifts for toddlers and young kids. The boys play with all of their Little People sets. Stimulates imagination and is so much fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loves it!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our 14 month old grandson. He is obsessed by airplanes so this seemed like the perfect toy to get for him to keep at our house. Like any Fischer Price toy, it is extremely well made. Super sturdy and very colorful. The things the airplane, and the people say, are the cutest things! The pilot even thanks you for flying with them. You hear the brakes screech to a halt, island music plays, etc. I think as he gets another month or two older, he'll even enjoy it more than he does now! Great price on Amazon. Fischer Price toys just last forever too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fisher Price does it again. They make toys of great quality that can withstand day to day adventures. It will be around for a long while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Here comes Grandma!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 3 year old grandson so he can pretend grandmas coming to visit. He loved it and it helped him understand how grandma gets to his house. Well made, sound is perfect, not too loud. Only complaint is that it didn't come with the little suitcase that I saw in some pictures (but not all) of this set. Turbins are stickers and do not rotate. Overall loved this product. Arrived next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for toddler birthday. Seems safe for age - durable and fun toy from Fisher Price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pedido llegó completo y rápido, justo lo que esperábamos. Muy bien, los felicito...👏👏👏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Toy for Toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I was very satisfied with this purchase. It comes in a box which I did open to ensure everything was inside, and I was super pleased to find that the batteries were included, just not installed. I installed them, and then put the plane back in the box to wrap as a present. Im not sure how they fit the plane in the first time, but you may consider just waiting until its open before trying to fuss around with it. The songs and phrases are cute, and I can't wait to give it to my 18 month old for Christmas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen precio por lo que es
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de armar, el embalaje impecable, los niños se divierten mucho, un juguete que cumple y que les divierte.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it, super popular - just didn’t know it made noise
reviews.reviewText: This is loved by all the kids in our house. I didn’t realize that it made noise (via pressing a button) which can’t be switched off or turned down. Otherwise it’s a big hit, really great toy. Great quality and loads of fun being had playing with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: No idea My grandson loves it!
reviews.reviewText: He is 15 months old and plays with it constantly. Well made, safe.
Me encanto perfectamente empacado y tal cual como se ve en la imagen
